name.description: Name of the place is required and must be a string.

category.description: Category must be one of 'restaurant', 'hotel', or 'attraction'.

street.description: Street address is required and must be a string.

city.description: City is required and must be a string.

country.description: Country is required and must be a string.

postal_code.description: Postal code is required and must be a string.

lat.description: Latitude is required and must be a double.

lon.description: Longitude is required and must be a double.

tags.description: Optional array of tags for the place.

average_rating.description: Optional average rating of the place.

sentiment_score.description: Optional sentiment score based on reviews.

reviews_count.description: Optional count of total reviews for the place.

additionalProperties.description: Opening hours for each day of the week in 'HH:mm-HH:mm' format.

opening_hours.description: Opening hours are required and must be an object.

preferred_visit_period.description: Optional array of preferred months to visit the place.

hours.description: Array of time ranges for popular visit times.

photos.description: Optional array of photo URLs for the place.

event_date.description: Date and time of the event in ISO format.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the review in ISO format.
